local_intent: Perceive the white plate, move above it, approach and align for a robust top grasp, set TCP yaw, and verify arrival at the target.
assumptions: White plate remains at the detected pose between perception and approach
Grasp pose computation has been or will be provided by the global tree prior to pick
Environmental obstacles are unchanged during the approach
coherence_with_global: Implements the 'approach' phase of the global plan: re-check perception, perform the MoveAbove (active leaf), align precisely, set end-effector yaw, and verify position before pick. Uses retry on perception consistent with recovery guidance.
